titleInfo.title: Proposing a New Model for the Performance Assessment of Students through Utilizing 360 Degree Feedback (Case Study: Performance Assessment of the Students of Imam Ali Military University)

name.affiliation: دانشجوی دکتری مدیریت تحقیق در عملیات، دانشگاه علامه طباطبایی
کارشناس ارشد مدیریت صنعتی، دانشگاه علامه طباطبایی
دانشجوی دکتری سیاست‌گذاری علم و فناوری، سازمان پژوهش‌های علمی و صنعتی

mods.abstract: The efficient use of assessment system is highly beneficial to the improvement carried out in different academic process of universities. The performance assessment should be implemented with remarkable sensitivity due to the crucial role of job sensitivity that will be carried by the graduates from Imam Ali military university. Proposing and also designing a new model of performance assessment is of crucial significance due to the problems created by traditional models of performance assessment. In an attempt to propose a new model of performance assessment through utilizing 360 degree feedback, the precise indicators of performance assessment were explained and also identified at the early stage of investigation. Having identified the indicators and also adjusting it to statistical population, the indictors of performance assessment were emerged and then weighted as a result of administering a Likert questionnaire and also consulting with elites and experts. Thereupon, the weight and the significance of assessment resources were emerged as a result of paired test and AHP analysis. Moreover, fuzzy TOPSIS method was also run to rank the students of Imam Ali military university at the final stage of investigation. Greater exploitation of fuzzy data is due to the conceptual and intellectual inner nature of outcomes. Moreover, in terms of consistency of research purposes and statistical population, the study was conducted through utilizing purposive sampling method. In this study, the precise and the appropriate indicators of performance assessment were identified through proposing a comprehensive and multi-dimensional assessment system. The findings revealed that the indicators of performance assessment including identifying the students' strength and weaknesses precisely and academically, identifying the problems and the obstacles ahead of education system as well as providing assistance in developing appropriate curriculum planning, participating the students in assessment process which contribute to the enhancement of their motivation and also improving their performance and finally reducing the fuzzy uncertainty about judgments and outcomes.

titleInfo.title: Development and Prioritization of Research Strategies of Iranian State Universities through Utilizing SWOT Analysis and Analytic Network Process

name.affiliation: کارشناس ارشد مدیریت اجرایی، مدرس دانشگاه افسری امام علی(ع)
استادیار مدیریت سیاست‌گذاری، عضو هیئت علمی دانشگاه افسری امام علی(ع)

mods.abstract: Utilization of strategic planning models is taken as the prevalent action among different departments of university. As an applied and descriptive study, this research aims at explaining and also prioritizing the research strategies at Iranian state university and is also aimed at facilitating the research affairs and managerial issues of university. For this purpose and in terms of statistical population, from among all research elites and experts affiliated to the case study university, 25 participants were selected as a sample population. This study was also conducted through administering a questionnaire among participants in order to collect required data for data analysis. To delve into this issue in this study and also in an attempt to explain research strategies at Iranian state university, SWOT model were run at the early stage of investigation. Thereupon, ANP analysis was also run to prioritize the enhancing factors affecting the research strategies including aims, criteria, sub-criteria and strategic options. The findings revealed that in terms of implementing strategic planning, SO strategies stood at the top of prioritization. Finally, in terms of enjoying the exploitation of upcoming opportunities, universities are expected to make their attempts to identify and also utilize their potential strengths.

titleInfo.title: A Site Selection of Border Military Posts and the Identification of Penetration-Prone Areas on the Borderlines through Utilizing Fuzzy Inference Systems and GIS (Case Study: Nehbandan Borderlines)

name.affiliation: دانشجوی دکتری ژئومورفولوژی، مدرس دانشگاه افسری امام علی(ع)
دانشیار ژئومورفولوژی، دانشگاه علوم انتظامی امین

mods.abstract: The security of international borderlines among countries is identified as a crucial factor in providing national security. Among borderlands of Iran, in different historical junctures, the south of Khorasan province is always very prone to incidents and insecurity due to its geopolitical position. Moreover, this area is now threatened with numerous threats to national security including drug trafficking from Afghanistan to Iran, terrorist activities, the presence of extra-regional countries and forces in proximity of Iranian borderlines, the threat of ethnic and religious demands and illegal residence of people from some neighboring countries particularly Afghanistan. This study was an attempt to identify and also select appropriate sites of border military posts in Nehbandan- Afghanistan borderlines through relying on the capabilities of geomorphological units. This study was also aimed at enhancing the operational and defensive capabilities to fight against insurgents, drug trafficking and goods smuggling and also aimed at taking defensive measures on the borderlands. In terms of research data collection procedures, the study was conducted through utilizing the variety of geological maps, aerial photographs, satellite images as well as conceptual tools including software and models. Thereupon, area modeling were emerged as a result of utilizing fuzzy inference system and also investigating the factors including geomorphological units, geology, lithology, land utilities, easy access to the settlements, transportation routes, height, slope and finally drainage networks. The findings revealed that borderlands of Nehbandan are prone to penetrate. The findings also revealed that the drug trafficking, goods smuggling and insurgents’ penetration can be eradicated through suggestions including investigating the geological maps of military site selection, identifying the capabilities and limitations of geomorphological units in Nehbandan- Afghanistan borderlines, establishing 16 military posts on the borderlines and finally utilizing these units to fight against insurgents.

titleInfo.title: Ways of Making Improvements to Consumption Model of Administrative Affairs for Implementing Resistive Economy at Imam Ali Military University

name.affiliation: دانشجوی دکتری مدیریت سیاست‌گذاری عمومی، مدرس دانشگاه افسری امام علی(ع)
کارشناس ارشد مدیریت دفاعی، مدرس دانشگاه افسری امام علی(ع)

mods.abstract: Resistive economy is identified as an offensive economic measure against severe damage to the national economy caused by foreign sanctions and is also aimed at improving the economic indicators as well as making attempts to pull the economy out of sanction and recession. Resistive economy is also taken as the means of implementing academic and comprehensive plan for financial and human resources management. Moreover, making improvements to consumption model not only could lead to the implementation of resistive economy but also could optimize the consumption model through improving the use of available financial resources. This study was an attempt to identify the different ways of making improvements to consumption model in administrative affairs for implementing resistive economy at Imam Ali military university. As a field study and mixed method including both qualitative and quantitative methods, the study was conducted through engaging the statistical population of 80 skilful and experienced staff and experts affiliated to the different departments of Imam Ali military university. To collect the research required data and for data collection and analysis, a questionnaire was administered among statistical population. Thereupon, 16 components of improvements in consumption model were emerged and then prioritized as a result of qualitative and quantitative data analysis. The findings revealed that making improvements to consumption model for administrative affaires have a direct effect on implementing resistive economy at Imam Ali military university.

titleInfo.title: The Identification and the Explanation of the Competencies of Higher Education in Defense Sector (Case Study; Military Organization)

name.affiliation: دانشجوی دکتری مدیریت سیستم‌ها، دانشگاه امام حسین(ع)
دانشیار مدیریت راهبردی، دانشگاه افسری امام علی(ع)

mods.abstract: Enhancement of combat preparedness is among the most organizational concerns at military organizations, especially in carrying out the organizational missions. Similarly, higher education is among the most crucial parameters in enhancing the combat preparedness and its success and promotion is influenced by many factors including updating, competency and futuristic point of view. To address this issue and also in a bid to achieve the appropriate higher education, planning and identification of the competencies are highly required and are of crucial significance. As a mixed method including both qualitative and quantitative methods, the study was conducted through administering a questionnaire among higher military education elites and experts. Thereupon, data collection procedures and analysis were also run in this study. This study was an attempt to identify and also explain the competencies of higher military education in defense sector. In this study, the challenges and the obstacles ahead of higher education is also investigated. The findings revealed that the competitive superiority of an organization is among the most crucial competency of an organization and its preservation also requires precise planning. Moreover, these competencies including emphasizing on human morality as well as maintaining discipline and order. The findings also revealed that the appropriate futuristic competencies including changing traditional ear to learning organization, developing the contents of education system through increasing competencies of problem-solving skills, setting the financial codes based on education system, using the services provided by manpower, updating the equipment, establishing the information technology centers, using the distance learning as well as equipping the classes with audio and video equipment

titleInfo.title: The Efficiency of Consultative Services of the Iranian Army Internal Auditing System in Light of Resistive Economy

name.affiliation: کارشناس ارشد عملیات مشترک، عضو هیئت علمی دانشکده فرماندهی و ستاد آجا

mods.abstract: This study was an attempt to investigate the efficiency of the consultative services of the Iranian army internal auditing system in light of resistive economy. The study is also aimed at identifying the effective factors enhancing the efficiency of the consultative services of Iranian army internal auditing system through investigating resistive economy. As an applied and descriptive study and also in terms of research primary and secondary Questions, this research not only tries to investigate the efficiency of consultative services of internal auditing system but also make an attempt to identify the factors affecting its effectiveness. In this study, research required data was collected through field and library study. For this purpose and in terms of statistical population, the participants were selected from among those officials and experts who are engaged in financial affairs including controllers, finance and monetary affairs. To this end, 60 participants were randomly selected out of a population of 130 experts based on Cochran formula. To analyze the data, content analysis was run to analyze the quantitative data and in terms of analyzing qualitative data, non-parametric test, Kolmogorov-Smirnov test, Wilcoxon test and P-value were also run in this study. The findings revealed that developing data collection and mining for decision-making, identifying the problems as well as providing written reports, offering solutions to problems and also improving the internal auditing system are among the most effective factors enhancing the consultative services of Iranian army internal auditing system in light of resistive economy.
